section.title: Computer Algebra System PARI
section.para: This package offers an &ffi-pac;-based interface to &pari-link;.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-my; contains the symbol :PARI.
section.para: PARI objects are printed and read using a special #Z"" syntax.
Most functions accept lisp objects as well as PARI objects and return PARI objects, which can be converted to lisp using the pari:pari-to-lisp function.

simplesect.title: Extending the module
Real precision
simplesect.para:
The real precision defaults to pari:pari-real-precision which specifies the default precision in decimal digits:
pari:pari-real-precision 327 (&length; (&prin1-to-string; (pari:pari-to-lisp (pari:pari-pi)))) 331
One can also pass the precision parameter explicitly, specifying the number of ffi:ulong words which the resulting PARI number should occupy:
(&length; (&prin1-to-string; (pari:pari-to-lisp (pari:pari-pi :prec 40)))) 735on 64-bit platforms 368on 32-bit platforms (pari:pari-real-precision 40) 732on 64-bit platforms 366on 32-bit platforms
